import React, { Component } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router' class Toddler extends Component { render() { console.log(this.props.toddlerShow, this.props.toddlerId, "Toddler") let toddler = this.props.toddlerShow const handleOnDelete = (toddlerId) => { this.props.delete(toddlerId) } return (
{/*

Toddler component

*/}

{toddler.name}'s profile

Birthday Emergency Contact Phone Allergy
{toddler.birthday} {toddler.contact} {toddler.phone} {toddler.allergy}
{this.props.history.push('/toddlers')}
) } } export default withRouter(Toddler)
